Name: Ganyu
Title: "Plenilune Gaze" Ganyu
Desc: "This press release is due tomorrow... I suppose I could work through the night and get it done."
Source: Reward for inviting Ganyu to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

C111012.Name: Ice Lotus
C111012.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When your active character receives DMG: </color>Decreases DMG taken by 1.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

11013.Name: Frostflake Arrow
11013.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], deals 2 $[K5] to all opposing characters on standby.

K5.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color>
K5.Desc: Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.

11014.Name: Celestial Shower
11014.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], deals 1 $[K5] to all opposing characters on standby, summons 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C111011]</color>.

K5.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color>
K5.Desc: Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.

C111011.Name: Sacred Cryo Pearl
C111011.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 $[K101], deal 1 $[K5] to all opposing characters on standby.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

K101.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>
K101.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}Cryo and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Melt</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Superconduct</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Frozen</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives Physical or Pyro DMG, in which case they will take +2 DMG)

K5.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color>
K5.Desc: Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
